RTVWithCsVotingSystem.rtv_cooldown: {default} You have to wait {lime}{0} {default}seconds before using {lightred}!rtv {default}or {lightred}!unrtv {default}again.
RTVWithCsVotingSystem.rtv_voted: {default}You have already voted for a map change. Type {purple}!unrtv {default}in chat if you want to remove your vote.
RTVWithCsVotingSystem.rtv_not_available: {lightred} RTV{default} is currently unavailable. Press the {purple}TAB key {default}to view the remaining time until {lightred}RTV {default}becomes available.
RTVWithCsVotingSystem.unrtv_not_availabl: {lightred} RTV{default} is currently unavailable. Press the {purple}TAB key {default}to view the remaining time until {lightred}RTV {default}becomes available.
RTVWithCsVotingSystem.rtv_enabled: {lightred} RTV{default} is now available! Type {purple}!rtv {default}in chat to vote for a map change.
RTVWithCsVotingSystem.rtv: {green}{0}{default} has voted to change the map [{lime}{1} {default}voted/{lime}{2} {default}required].
RTVWithCsVotingSystem.unrtv: {green}{0}{default} has removed their vote to change the map [{lime}{1} {default}voted/{lime}{2} {default}required].
